item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host Service Datatype Description Local credentialId The credential this allowed host will use Type: integer id The internal identifier of the igroup Type: integer name The name of allowed host, usually an IQN or other identifier Type: string resourceTableId Type: integer resourceTableName Type: string Relational assignedGroups The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Group objects this SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host is present in.
